reviewText: Just received yesterday, played the first one last night and it is bright and clear and fun! I already donate to PBS and didn't want to pay a forturne to get these, so great to find them on Amazon!
Great response time with quality material. The best!!

This is the exact PBS program that you've seen plus a few more stars singing more hits of theirs.  Something for everybody plus some interesting interviews.

I'd definitely recommend this.  And great seeing some of these stars in such good shape!  I only wish there were more of them in this.
